BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. C 180032 HAX submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for an Urban Development Action Area Project and disposition of City-owned property located at 425 Grand Concourse, Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 1, Council District 17.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. N 180033 ZRX submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Sections 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the New York City Zoning Resolution, modifying Appendix F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Area, Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 1, Council District 17.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
